title: Emerald Radiance Jhumki: A Fusion of Elegance
materials: these earrings feature a striking pear-cut Emerald gemstone
complemented by brilliant-cut Diamonds. The emerald boasts a vibrant green hue and excellent clarity.
features: These captivating jhumkis blend traditional South Indian design principles with modern aesthetics. The floral motif at the base cradles the emerald, while a delicate cascade of diamonds extends upwards, culminating in a stylized 'Karnaphoolu' design. The open setting allows maximum light to penetrate the gemstones, enhancing their brilliance.
colors: The color palette features a harmonious blend of the rich green of the emerald
the fiery sparkle of the diamonds
and the warm blush of the rose gold.
occasions: Perfect for a modern bride's reception
or as a statement piece for any special occasion. Also suitable for pre-wedding celebrations like Sangeet or Mehendi.
description: These Jhumkis represent a stunning fusion of traditional South Indian motifs with contemporary design sensibilities. The use of high-quality emeralds and diamonds ensures lasting beauty and value. The rose gold setting adds a touch of modern romance, making these earrings a truly unique and desirable piece of jewelry.
